orb weaver. Now this orb weaver is able to go get debris, bring it back to his web,
and create little bitty decoys and things like that in his web. So it sounds like we're
getting close, but here's the difference. We have not seen anything near this accurate
in these little trash-line orb weavers. First of all there's eight legs. That in itself is
mind blowing to me. But there's two other things I think are pretty cool as well. You notice that there's
both an abdomen on each one, but also there's a cephalothorax which is the
combination between the head and the thorax. That is amazing. So the verdict is still out
